ygData.subject: Need assistance please
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi fellow bards! I need some information assistance. We are having an event on my server, Karana, on Saturday. We are having a chessmatch at the chessboard
ygData.messageBody:
Hi fellow bards!

I need some information assistance. We are having an event on my server,
Karana, on Saturday. We are having a chessmatch at the chessboard with duels.
Different level players have been chosen for the role's of King, Queen,
Bishop, Rooks and Pawns. I volunteered to be there because my guild has a
major role in the event. I am a Level 11 bard. I figured I would be asked to
assist in the organization of the event. However, I have been chosen as a
PAWN! Could anyone advise me on the best strategy to employ to possibly come
out of this alive? I know I am probably being vague as to some of the rules of
the game but that is because they are still being determined. I do know that
charming will not be allowed. Only self-buffs will be allowed. DOT's are
allowed.

I am still in the process of figuring out how to be the best bard that I can
be and I have a lot to learn. So I look to each of you......the experts!

Thanks in advance for any assistance you could give me!

Melodii (Bard of 11 seasons)
